Leeds Quant Crim

A group of researchers interested in quantitative criminology. Based at the University of Leeds.

Emily Sheard (March 2016)

16 Mar 2016

In our March meeting, Emily Sheard (School of Geography) presented her ongoing PhD work, entitled:

Can Consumer-related Data Predict the Spatial Distribution of Crime?

Graham Farrell (School of Law) was due to present, but cancelled due to illness
